t: The List Of Things You Can Get Through Amazon Now Includes Fine Art
s: May 2, 2017 - An award-winning team of journalists, designers, and videographers who tell brand stories through Fast Company's distinctive lensFC Executive Board ... Amazon has a new art market place. Amazon Art is an online retail space dedicated to giving consumers access to real artwork.

t: Amazon HQ2 Artist
s: We invite you to explore! ... Working closely with the Amazon design and project teams, Indiewalls led the art curation, sourcing, production, and installation of the art collection at Amazon HQ2. The collection was inspired by the design narrative and brand voice set by the Amazon team.

t: The Work of Art in the Age of Amazon | The New Yorker
s: August 20, 2013 - Without the restrictions of a physical gallery space, Amazon Art seems to go on forever—a fun-house hallway of meticulously counted works of art.
